title: Rashford scores as Barcelona beat Copenhagen
body_text:
Rashford scores as Barcelona beat Copenhagen
This content isn't available any more.
There was an error
Marcus Rashford gets on the scoresheet as Barcelona come from behind to soundly defeat Copenhagen 4-1, as they secure automatic qualification into the last 16 of the Champions League.
MATCH REPORT: Champions League - Barcelona 4-1 Copenhagen
Available to UK users only.
